# isDeferredStartSupported

**Instance Property**

A `BOOL` value that indicates whether the output supports deferred start.

## Declaration

```swift
var isDeferredStartSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

You can only set the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureOutput/isDeferredStartEnabled] property value to `true` if the output supports deferred start.

## Managing deferred start

- **isDeferredStartEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to defer starting this capture output.
